about_the_game: This game places players in a challenging environment where they must nimbly use the A and D keys to move their character and dodge knives falling from the sky. The game features a clean and vivid visual style with high contrast colors, making the falling knives stand out and adding to the tension. The background music is lively yet carries a hint of urgency, with the sound of each knife hitting the ground heightening the sense of alertness. Players start with three lives, losing one each time they are hit by a knife. The longer you survive, the higher your score, and the greater the challenge becomes. As time progresses, the speed and frequency of the falling knives increase, posing even greater challenges to the player. This is a game that tests reaction speed and operational skills, perfect for those seeking excitement and a challenge.
